short_summary: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for the provision of a telescopic mast system.
description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for the provision of a telescopic mast system that includes a low-profile, rapidly deployable, and adjustable Telescopic Mast, to perform a variety of communication functions, including discreet communications in high-risk environments throughout the world.
full_summary:
### Telescopic Masts Tender

**Announcement Reference:** cb-200-31331210 (Amendment 12)
**Solicitation Number:** W6399-21-LF63/A
**Publication Date:** December 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 22, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the supply and installation of telescopic masts. The project entails the provision of a low-profile, rapidly deployable, and adjustable telescopic mast system that performs various communication functions, including discreet communications in high-risk environments globally.

**Key Details:**

* **CFTA Trading Agreement:** This tender is open to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) compliant bidders.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Bidders are eligible to submit from anywhere in the world.
* **Regions of Delivery:** The project will take place in Canada.
* **Contract Duration:** The project is expected to commence on January 22, 2024, and be completed by March 31, 2024.

**Tender Documentation:**

The tender package includes the following attachments:

* RFP (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26937/w6399_21_lf63_rfp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26937/w6399_21_lf63_rfp_en.pdf)
* RFP (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26937/w6399_21_lf63_rfp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26937/w6399_21_lf63_rfp_fr.pdf)
* Amendment 1 Questions (English & French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26937/w6399-21-lf63_amd01_questions_en_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26937/w6399-21-lf63_amd01_questions_en_fr.pdf)
* Amendment 2 Questions (English & French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform
